This adaptor does the following...
* reads data to stdin * writes data down a socket
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that connects to a socket and writes data
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringApplication -config writer.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
If order to run it, needs to connect to the remote socket, run the corresponding reader example and input data at the command line
